sentences.sentence: The complications included 4 transient paresis and 2 transient slurred speech.
sentences.translation: 术后出现一过性对侧轻瘫4例，一过性语言不利2例。

sentences.sentence: Objective to analyse the clinical features in general paresis of insane (GPI) as to offering an early diagnosis.
sentences.translation: 目的分析麻痹性痴呆(GPI)的临床特征及提供早期诊断依据。

sentences.sentence: Complications included cerebrospinal fluid fistula in 1 case, mild facial paresis in 2, facial numbness in 6 and labial herpes in 11.
sentences.translation: 并发症有脑脊液漏1例、轻度面瘫2例、面部麻木6例、术后口唇嘴角处疱疹11例。
